name: UNDERWATER: STAY ALIVE
description: An amazing alien world is revealed in from of your eyes. Your task is to survive and find out the cause of your ship's tragic events. But BEWARE !!!  You are not the only survivor in the ocean’s depth.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2+ GHZ Dual Core or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or better Storage: 2 GB available space
